website_summaries.verdict: This dispenser's angled design ensures it sprays soap where you want it and none back on itself.
pros: Dispenser head is angled to prevent nozzle from dripping or spraying soap on itself
Soap chamber located at bottom, preventing damage to battery compartment
Clear chamber so you can easily see when it's time to refill
cons: Some find the base slides out easily if moved frequently
Several reports that dispenser stopped working over time

customer_reviews.title: Our Spitting soap dragon
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old grandson finds it difficult to push down on a typical pump soap dispenser. He loves dinosaurs & dragons so I added some eyes, nostrils, scales & a tail all made of Sculpty clay and attached them with glue. He LOVES this and wants to wash his hands all the time. He loves seeing the smiley face after the foam has been dispensed. This works great!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie G.

customer_reviews.title: Makes hand washing fun and works awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it's the little things in life like this soap dispenser that you find yourself really happy about. Washing my hands is pretty much an all day every hour or so occurence and I love foaming hand soap. This dispenser gives you a nice, dense foam(you have to fill it with foaming hand soap) and as soon as I put my hand under it it dispenses it perfectly in my hand. Makes hand washing quicker and easier for all of us. My 3 and 5 year old oftens struggled with the other dispenser. Im hoping the batteries last a long time in it and dont need frequent replacements .
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Super simple and straight functional soap dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: This depsenser is super simple. Just had to add 3x AA batteries, fill the bottle with 3/4 water and 1/4 soap (I just used normal body soap), swish it around some (don't shake, you'll just make bubbles) and then put your hand under the nozzle - first try got soap. It's quiet, very quick response and now I just don't have to think about soap in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Stamper / NaytonTech

customer_reviews.title: Feeling safe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this soap dispenser after COVID-19 had started, because I didn't want to touch anything once I am back from outside. Now I can go directly to the bathroom and wash my hands without touching even the soap bottle. This is a very nice and convenient soap dispenser that allows to regulate the amount of soap dispensed. Very convenient and nice looking device. Highly recommend this device
customer_reviews.author: Minnie Love

customer_reviews.title: Good dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write many reviews but this was real bad. It did not even last a month before it just stopped working. I replaced the battery and then it started to go haywire. Sort of disappointed. The second one was replaced by the company with no issues and it works fantastic! I’ve had no issues. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Jolene

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable. Motion detector has a mind of its own
customer_reviews.text: When the motion detector actually functions properly, the unit performs well. But the motion detector is intermittent for no apparent reason. Rechecked and replaced batteries although I was sure that wasn't the issue. Of course, it made no difference. The motion detection function is totally unreliable. May work a couple or three times in a row and then doesn't work for a week or more. Then works again for a few shots of soap. Find another product.
customer_reviews.author: S737

customer_reviews.title: A Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought didn't work at all. Returned it. Second one did not have instructions as to what kind of liquid soap to put in. Tried liquid hand-soap but pump/narrow suction tube not strong enough. Used a mixture of liquid dish detergent and water. That worked. For a while. Design is very top heavy so it got knocked over during regular use in bathroom. Then battery case wouldn't close and detergent tank fell off. So I taped it all together. Worked for a little while. Now it's completely dead. Going to buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Podolny

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it works great and does what it’s suppose to. What I wish is that the liquid soap container attached to the whole base dispenser. Every time you bump or move it, you have to grab two pieces to move it or it falls apart—it’s annoying. I also wish the liquid soap container was bigger. I have to refill it once every 5-6 days whereas other similar products lasted at least 1.5-2 weeks before refilling. Otherwise, no issues with the sensor or amount of soap dispensed. I used liquid Castile soap concentrate and it works great. Added bonus with the light up green smiley face when it senses and dispensed soap, and a red sad face when it can’t dispense.
customer_reviews.author: Pollupy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically pleasing and the perfect size to have in any bathroom or kitchen. It's very easy to set up and the motion sensor functions perfectly, dispensing just the right amount of foam. I diluted very thick antibacterial soap with 3-parts water and it works flawlessly. Haven't used it long enough to comment on longevity nor sturdiness, but it seems to be well-constructed. A bit overpriced IMO. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ACHA

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two months.
customer_reviews.text: I had originally bought this as recommended by Ross N's very nice review. Initially I was happy with the product, but then it stopped working after 2 months. I've changed the batteries and still doesn't do anything when it is turned on and activated. I ponied up the money and bought the more expensive Simple Human foaming soap dispensers when they were on sale making it about twice this price, and don't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Abootman

customer_reviews.title: Good dispenser, poor reservoir design
customer_reviews.text: It’s a friendly little gadget. Dispenses a nice pile of foamy suds. I have only two complaints. 1. The soap reservoir is quite small. With five people living here and friends over on a daily basis, we’ll need to refill it probably twice a week. 2. The reservoir isn’t secured to the body of the dispenser at all. I expected it to click into place, but no. If you lift the dispenser without specifically holding onto the reservoir, the two pieces separate immediatly. I would have given five stars if this were fixed. Overall, not a bad gadget, but I’ll try a different manufacturer for the next bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Monica R

customer_reviews.title: Dispenses when you don't want it to
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful for this soap dispenser but it didn't work well for us as anytime we so much as looked at it, it would dispense more soap. AS you put your hands under it would dispense and then as you pulled away it would dispense even more and then if you tried to wipe up what was on the counter under it or move it it would then continue dispensing. We waisted a lot of soap this way. We had purchased 2 of them and they both did the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Ohsberg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the little hands
customer_reviews.text: I created a Montessori inspired self care station for my 2yo. This soap dispenser is perfect for her as she isn't quite strong enough for those ordinary dispensers. She likes seeing the smiley face blinking. The assembly (which was not much to assemble) was super easy, I added water to the soap as instructed. The only thing I can 'complain' is it being 'too sensitive'. It dispenses foamy soap whenever there's movement detached. Sometimes accidents happens when I was cleaning the tabletop and it senses my hands wiping underneath. I know I could just turn it off so really this is not really an issue. I'm satisfied with the product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Flora Lau

customer_reviews.title: Love them so much I bought 3 and am buying another one!
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser is great to use with foaming soap. You don't have to use a specialty soap to get the fun foam. Add a little purified water to regular liquid hand soap, and the touchless soap dispenser will foam it for you. You can also use this dispenser with foaming hand sanitizer. The soap compartment is clear to make it easy to see when it is time to fill.
customer_reviews.author: hellcatt

customer_reviews.title: Love this dispenser!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This auto sensor dispenser is a game changer in my house. My 3 year old toddler no longer has issues washing her hands because the regular soap dispensers were nearly impossible for her to push down on her own. She’s even more excited to go on the potty by herself because she knows she gets to use the fun dispenser to wash her hands afterwards. I used regular foam soap to fill the case. Since other reviewers commented how the soap cartridge doesn’t stay attached to the dispenser, I used masking tape (yellow tape can be seen on the sides in my video) to keep the soap cartridge attached and in place.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty Joy

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Foaming Soap Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful foaming soap dispenser. I didn’t have any trouble assembling it. I did use the thinner foaming soap rather than dilute regular soap. When I first used it too much soap was coming out but after I reset the amount to low it is much better. The instructions are amusing. I don’t think they are meant to be. Just not written by someone who speaks English as their first language. I’ve only had the dispenser for 3 days so I’ll try to remember to edit this if there’s a problem. Edit May 24, 2020. I still love this dispenser. It is definitely my favorite quarantine frivolous purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Knittingloie

customer_reviews.title: Easy and reliable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because our previous touchless dispenser would keep going off even when no one was at the sink, wasting a lot of battery and soap. So far, Laopao's dispenser is working very well. It's easy to trigger the sensor when a hand is under the dispenser, but it doesn't randomly go off. The volume for the soap is just what we like. I especially like the smiley face that flash for about 15 seconds after dispensing soap, which I use as a reminder for my toddler to scrub and rinse. (realize 20 seconds is better, but 15 seconds is already better than what she was doing on her own). Overall I'd recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Clean look, easy to use and install
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two on a lightning deal. One white and white blue. Both arrived on time but interestingly, in two different sized boxes. Both were exactly the same however. Easy to install (3 AA batteries), easy to use, dispenses plenty of soap. (I use foam soap) My son likes the happy face when the motion sensor is detected. I’m happy with this purchase. I thought this would hold a lot more soap than a regular disposable bottle. I’ve only had this for a week, so I’ll update when the batteries start to go low. Hopefully it’ll be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: vic781123

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and install, clean look
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two on a lightning deal. One white and white blue. Both arrived on time but interestingly, in two different sized boxes. Both were exactly the same however. Easy to install (3 AA batteries), easy to use, dispenses plenty of soap. (I use foam soap) My son likes the happy face when the motion sensor is detected. I’m happy with this purchase. I thought this would hold a lot more soap than a regular disposable bottle. I’ve only had this for a week, so I’ll update when the batteries start to go low. Hopefully it’ll be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: vic781123

customer_reviews.title: One of those "great buys" of Amazon
customer_reviews.text: My expectations weren't super high for such a reasonably priced item but this soap dispenser is awesome. It has been consistently perfect, dispenses the right amount of hand soap every time...and it isn't an eye sore. I love the smiley face that lights up when you get soap! I was so happy with the one I bought for my kitchen, I purchased a second one for the guest bath. I've had the first one since July and the second one since August, and there have been absolutely no issues as I write this at the end of September. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Dial anti-microbial foaming soap.
customer_reviews.text: I have two different brands of foaming soap dispensers and I much prefer this one. I produces a better foam and the lower setting works perfectly for a quick hand washing. I use only Dial anti-microbial foaming soap in my dispensers so I can't comment on how this device might work with other foaming soaps but it works extremely well with Dial. These automatic dispensers are worth the money for their convenience. I hated having to clean dirt or grease off the manual pump dispensers after I had pumped out foam with dirt on my hands. These "no touch" automatic dispensers completely eliminate the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Novak

customer_reviews.title: Works well if you tweek your formula
customer_reviews.text: Gone through 3 fills thus far = Tried it at first with store bought foaming formula. Didn't dispense much. Used the suggested instructions, worked okay, but still I needed 2 dispenses to wash my hands properly, *NOT enough foam. Then I used a bit more water with the store bought & it works GREAT! So, I would suggest just adding more water if you're not getting enough foam. I tried the adjustment buttons but it was still not enough foam (not long enough). Also, if you wear black gloves it will not dispense. Sometimes it also dispenses if the light in the room changes (very rare).
customer_reviews.author: Complimentary

customer_reviews.title: Great Foamer
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great addition to keeping our hands clean with the pandemic. We now own 3 of these foamers and they work great with Hibiclens disinfectant soap. we just fill the bottle and the foam reduces waste and gives better coverage. no need to dilute as with some products. you may have to clean the nozzle from time to time if it is not used very often, a q-tip works great. i bought the first in early December and have not changed the batteries since. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Like the soap foam and that it's automatic, but it's inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the soap doesn't dispense from the machine. Other times, when no one is near it, it dispenses over and again, wasting soap. In order to prevent waste, we keep a sponge at the base of the dispenser to catch the soap that dispenses randomly. We've changed batteries, powered on and off, etc. Nothing helps.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Last
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. While I like the design of the dispenser and the ease of use, after four months of daily use, it stopped working and I am now shopping for another dispenser. I have cleaned it, changed the batteries a couple of times, replaced the liquid soap but cannot get the dispenser to turn on. This was a waste of money. I am very disappointed in the lack of longevity of the product. An additional complaint is the fact the the liquid soap holder is easily dislodged from the the dispenser. I tried using tiny velcro dots to help keep the top on, but they didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Mechelle

customer_reviews.title: Super soaper!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this soap dispenser. Now I can wash my hands without contaminating everything else - so handy when cooking and baking. It has two settings for a little bit of foam or a lot of foam. Just mix your preferred dishwashing liquid or hand soap 1:4 with water. I use Dawn Antibacterial so I can either wash my hands or soap up the kitchen sponge. I love it so much I sent one to my adopted daughter and she loves it too! "The smiley face that lights up is just the best!!" Her kids now love to wash their hands. Win!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Product doesnt work at all: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I could tell the moment I opened the box and took the dispenser out. The battery access panel didn't fit properly, the soap reservoir didn't fit correctly into the body of the dispenser and of course it dispenses nothing. Don't waste your time or money on this haphazardly designed and produced dispenser. This is a great example of why many items should be made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes sanitation a little easier
customer_reviews.text: Not having to touch anything with dirty hands from the garden or prepping food or the kids hands from all their play, it's great! Mixing my own refill is a joy. I'm using shampoo and can use a color and/or scent that I like and it's economical. Especially handy in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: great product, but not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased one of these a couple months ago, and loved it, so I bought another. it's a great product, but misleading because the container is no longer an aqua color, it's frosted white. it's not worth the hassle to return, but it was a main reason for purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: michelle f

customer_reviews.title: Pandemic friendly
customer_reviews.text: It’s funny all the things you’re suddenly in the market for in the setting of a deadly pandemic. This was a good purchase for our house as we all slowly become pathologic germaphobes. Super easy to set up, and I filled it with 1:4 Dr Bronners to water—creates a perfect amount of foam. My husband thinks it’s too much foam—it’s like a good 3 seconds’ worth of spray—but there’s no way to adjust the amt that comes out. Regardless, I think it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: SSK

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money and My Time/Energy UPDATE: They replaced unit
customer_reviews.text: This product does not provide sufficient amount of soap. I have to dispense 3-4 times at least to come close to decent amount of soap. I did everything to solve the problem. I put some water into the container in case the unit was clogged, changed batteries multiple times... Don’t waste your money on this and look elsewhere. UPDATE: Seller sent me a new one, which is working fine so far. Fingers crossed I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Loved it until I had to lift it to clean under and around it. The plastic soap container doesn’t have a lock to attach it to the dispenser so when when you lift it, the soap container falls. Other than that, it does what it’s supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: May1 Balbarin

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller, Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I initially had a problem with the first dispenser I was sent. I sent an email to the seller and they immediately sent me a new one with no extra cost and were very quick to respond via email on the initial issue. After using the soap dispenser it is quite handy to not be touching a soap dispenser and its easy to use for filling with soap. Great Seller, Good Product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: since the increase of hand washing, its been tough transiting my son with autism to increase his hand washing, that is until I bought this soap pump! oh man not only did my son love using this but my friends and family found this very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: SmallPrimeTime88

customer_reviews.title: Soap holder falls off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this automatic soap dispenser for my pre school and when picked up the soap holder repeatedly falls off and spills soap all over the floor, the sensor goes off and shoots soap all over when no one is by it. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wardle

customer_reviews.title: Dispenser doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The soap dispenser was unreliable from the start, and now after just a couple months has stopped working entirely. I should have returned it as soon as it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Fast

customer_reviews.title: First review: Works great : Updated (it stopped working after a year)
customer_reviews.text: Original review - October 2019 It’s great. I personally don’t like the Happy Face when it pours the soap but the product works flawlessly. Update - October 2020 I really liked this product, but it stopped working after one year of use. I don't know what's wrong, it doesn't pour, it doesn't light up or turn on. I tried new batteries and I have no way to easily open it to check if there is something visible wrong and easy to fix/clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tinos

customer_reviews.title: STOP!! Don't touch that dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little battery operated soap dispenser. Needed something to help with the dispensing of soap with out touching dispenser every time with all this Covid-19 stuff. Perfect little dispenser for foaming soap. We use the hospital grade 3M foaming soap and dispenses just fine. Take out of box, put batteries in and works great. Easy to fill and use. Perfect size for kitchen sink or bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: GSD

customer_reviews.title: Thick dense foam with fast response time!
customer_reviews.text: It's a wonderful product. Easy to assemble and start using with any soap. I used hand soap in one and dish soap in another. The foam is almost instant, thick and fast on repeat swipes. I'm absolutely satisfied with this purchase. I just ordered more! Check out my video and see for yourself!! My only suggestion is to include the dilution rate of 2oz soap to 6 oz water 1:3 in the instruction manual. I had to look it up on the product description. I used a scale for easy measuring. Also, instructions should include mixing the soap and water before replacing the lid and using.
customer_reviews.author: shawna

customer_reviews.title: Hands Free Foamng Soap Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to order this "hands free" foaming soap dispenser. The modern streamline design fits nicely in my newly remodeled kitchen . I had difficulty attaching the soap dispenser to the main housing. It took a lot of strength and severe attempts to push it firmly and have it lock into place. This product allows "touchless" dispensing of foaming soap which helps with reduce cross contamination. A cute illuminated "Happy Face" appears when the stream of foam soap is dispensed.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: Really loved this when i opehed it, however it won't lock the soap dispenser in place..tried the troubleshoot page where they said push it till you hear a click..unfortunately no click.. the more i push it, the more sanitizer i loose. Becsuse of this i havd to give a onecstar rating....Will look at other options as i really like the foam dispebser option.
customer_reviews.author: LESLEY J.

customer_reviews.title: Use only soap maid for this
customer_reviews.text: For hand wash .so far so good.i used it with special soap every thig was ok.i tried to used with normal soap mixed with water it worked afew days and stopped working.i had to fill it with only water to wash from inside.it started to work again
customer_reviews.author: Amjad

customer_reviews.title: The best thing is the smiley face light-up when used
customer_reviews.text: This item is a hands-free, reliable way to administer foaming soap. I wish the soap reservoir was even bigger, though it is larger than other dispensers, but that may detract from the overall appearance and ability to fit on the vanity. Otherwise, I'm very satisfied with this purchase and would buy it again - just for the smiley face that lights up when you use it. Thanks =)
customer_reviews.author: DY

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. It is responsive and makes everybody want to wash their hands. it is touchless, so if you need to wash your hands after handling meat or dirt, you don't have to worry about spreading bacteria. I did not know the smiling face when I saw the product online but it is a nice feature and very attractive specially for the youngest one in the family. I found this item so worthy that I'm going to get for the bathrooms and to gift.
customer_reviews.author: Yas

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I used one part Dawn and five parts water and it makes foam as thick as shaving cream. A couple of squirts does a lot of dishes! Great way to save money on soap while have convenient fun. Good instructions, be sure to read them. There is an on/off button.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3 of these and getting an other one!
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser is great to use with foaming soap. You don't have to use a specialty soap to get the fun foam. Add a little purified water to regular liquid hand soap, and the touchless soap dispenser will foam it for you. You can also use this dispenser with foaming hand sanitizer. The soap compartment is clear to make it easy to see when it is time to fill.
customer_reviews.author: hellcatt

customer_reviews.title: Reliable 7+ months so far; opening & closing is very poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this dispenser for more than 6 months so far. Pros: I love the motion detection and the adjustable dispenser functions. It's been very reliable compared to other similar competitors on Amazon. Cons: Poorly designed opener; It's a struggle to open the bottle to refill soap; Given the stress the opener puts on the bottle I think the plastic would last for a few more months from now
customer_reviews.author: Maximus

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE,  LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This foaming soap dispenser has increased the fun in our home. I actually look forward to washing my hands and my kids wash more often too. Just buy your favorite foaming soap scent and the rest works perfectly. I bought one for each sink and it's very clean and easy to use, plus it's hands-free which is most important. My only complaint is its appearance. I would prefer stainless steel or at least, all white. The blue container (bottom half) doesn't match my room colors. But, the product works so well, I'm willing to overlook that fact.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love them! I would highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these and love them! I used a regular bacterial soap and mixed 2/1 and it works perfectly! It does not look like it would be very easy to hang on the wall, because the back is rounded. I’m sure I could figure it out, but not easy. Everyone that comes over asks about them. I would highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great until it didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Had this since Feb and it worked great. Foamed well and over all complaints. Then it just stopped pumping. Face lights up and it sounds like it’s trying to, but no foam. Changed the batteries and that did nothing. Unfortunately due to the short life span of this product I cannot recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Works great in kitchen and kids love it
customer_reviews.text: It is a big help in the kitchen when hands are messy. I read other reviews where people said the soap reservoir doesn’t stay in place. As shown in photo, there is a lip that helps keep reservoir in place. I haven’t had any problems. Also like the fact that you can adjust the amount of foam that is dispersed. Grandkids love the happy face and are eager to wash their hands.
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working day after return window closed
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first, then completely stopped working one day after the 30-day return window closed. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: waterlady

customer_reviews.title: stops working after very short period of time, even with very good care/use
customer_reviews.text: stops working after very short period of time, even when cleaned, battery changed, and very diluted soap is added limited refund window so we are stuck with it
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of this because I wasn’t sure if I would like using it. After using for a week, I bought 2 more. So much neater looking then a used bar of soap and more sanitary than having to touch a pump dispenser. We are two adults, so not sure about kids using it. It is so fun and easy to use, I could envision them playing with it. On the bright side, they would probably have very clean hands. Batteries were easy to install. Since I am not a long time user, I have no comment regarding reliability of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: MLK

customer_reviews.title: I love this soap dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for the kitchen. With all of the COVID19 concerns, I thought it would be a great way to wash our hands without touching the dispenser. It works every time, you even get the cute smiley face! Easy to start up, easy to refill. I liked it so much I bought two more for our bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: T Rod

customer_reviews.title: Great Automatic Foaming Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several different automatic foaming soap dispensers, looking for a really good one. This is a really good one. It's quick to respond, powerful, and consistent. Only downside is that it's bright white and doesn't really go with many decors. Still, I'm buying more, and will figure out how to hide them or cover them so they look ok.
customer_reviews.author: S. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Real review. Stopped working after 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: Update: great seller. After my review I was sent a brand new replacement free of charge and this one is working perfectly. Great quality and service and definitely worth it. I bought this about 4 months ago and it worked good. Very sensitive and powerful. However, used a lot of battery. It stopped working yesterday for no reason.. I have 3 other models which have been working between 1 and 3 years with no issues. So if you want something for a few months or less than it's ok otherwise buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kamran M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great with a lot of foam!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this soap dispenser! The motion detector is just right- it isn’t too sensitive when you’re near it and also isn’t hard to dispense when you’re ready. The amount of foam that comes out is awesome (I did 4:1 water and Castile Soap). My kids get a kick out of the smiley face after the soap dispenses. This might be my favorite thing I’ve bought on Amazon lol
customer_reviews.author: AnAngelGrl

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I wrote an email directly to LAOPAO (not Amazon) when my soap dispenser stopped working. I received a response within 48 hours, and they sent me a new soap dispenser. I was very pleased with their quick response and customer service. I'm happy with this resolution. ORIGINAL REVIEW: I loved this at first - so great with kids and easy to use. Then it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Engelland

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product & Saves Soap!
customer_reviews.text: I had had this thing for almost a month now, using it at least a couple times a day and it has hardly used up any soap, yet it gets me the perfect amount that I need every time! The sensor is extremely accurate and you can set it to a low dispense setting (less soap) or a high dispense setting (more soap--which I have mine on). This is by far the best soap dispenser I have owned!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Wiehe

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how this soap dispenser gets 5 stars from folks. It doesn’t work well at all. Barely any soap comes out—have to wave your hand 5-6x to MAYBE get enough to wash your hands. I took it apart and cleaned it, double checked how much soap I added...same results. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Mr Soapy.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. We call it Mr Soapy because after it dispenses the soap there is a smiling face that shows up. Got another one just because it makes it fun for my grandkids to be safe & wash hands often. Great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Got 4!
customer_reviews.text: We love this soap dispenser so we got one for each bathroom and for the kitchen sink. It is slightly difficult to change the amount of soap it dispenses but once you get it to the right spot, we keep it on the lowest amount, then we absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Betbutton

customer_reviews.title: Bottom falls off; soap keeps coming out!
customer_reviews.text: I may have gotten a defective item since reviews have been good for this product - whenever I move mine, even slightly, the bottom detaches. The soap keeps spilling out after the first dispensing. I will probably return this item - not functioning as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap dispenser! I ordered one and I liked it so much that I ordered another one for the other bathroom! A friend saw mine, and went home and ordered one right away. I like that the amount of foam is adjustable, and the foam comes out a luxurious texture. It is very easy to use and refill. The company is also very customer service oriented, which I appreciate. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rae

customer_reviews.title: Gets used alot!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this soap dispenser. Took a couple times to get the soap mixture right...after that, perfect! Wish it was a little thinner to fit my bathroom pedestal sink, so I have it by my kitchen sink which gets used alot!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price. cute concept with the smiley face, doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: excited to get this product for hands free soap dispensing and the added cute smiley face. Unfortunately, the base won't lock in so if you move it or someone knocks it to the side, the two pieces immediately come apart- at least my unit did. Not the end of the world but for $30+, I expect it to at least remain one unit.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use Foam Soap Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: In light of the Covid19 virus, I wanted a hands-free dispenser. This has definitely fit the bill. While sometimes it gets confused and dispenses soap two or three times, Id rather have more than less. It's just the right size, not too big not too small; looks good in my bathroom and does it's job pretty darn well. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Reller

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Extremely small amount of foam comes out. You need to swipe the sensors 5 times to get enough foam to just wash 1 fork. VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: LOUISE COMORA

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My Granddaughter loves to wash her hands now. The smiley face was a nice touch. Better instructions would help. Also show what the optimal soap to water ratio would be for best foam production. I experimented and found a little less than half soap with warm water.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great dispenser
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! We use the thin liquid soap for the foam function. It’s great. The sensor isn’t too sensitive like our last one (not the same model) so I can actually wipe underneath it without it shooting soap everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: This automatic soap dispenser is a nice, neat and attractive soap dispenser. The best part of purchasing this dispenser is the company that stands behind it. I had an issue with my device , a small issue, and asked the seller how I might resolve it. Without hesitation, question or delay she committed to sending me another dispenser. I received it yesterday. This type of service stands above all of the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Robert in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and a nice addition to our new bathroom design.
customer_reviews.text: Great auto soap dispenser. Works every time, dispenses the perfect amount of soap, and my wife and kids live the little light up smiley face. Great quality and looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Go for it
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a touch less soap dispenser, and glad I went with this model. There was another model I preferred, but the shipping time was unacceptable. Its easy to assemble, can use regular liquid soap by diluting with 1:3 ratio. Not sure how long the battery will last though.
customer_reviews.author: Binish

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 4 months
customer_reviews.text: This product started off working so well and served a great purpose in our home during COVID. After 4 this product no longer works. For the price of this product and to only get 4 months use is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: iMama

customer_reviews.title: Great dispenser but a little to sensitive.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this soap dispenser but it is very sensitive. If anything goes near the sensor it shoots the soap out (and probably a little more than necessary). I have to be diligent about moving it if I am doing anything near the sink so I don't get blasted.
customer_reviews.author: bdbeclhv

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: batteries come loose if I'm not careful when I move it. Also shoots soap even if you don't want it to - senses movement anywhere near it. Otherwise - works!
customer_reviews.author: M. Kim G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for kids
customer_reviews.text: Love this dispenser. I’ll be buying more to have them in all our bathrooms. The happy face is great to get my kids to scrub longer. Love that it’s a foaming dispenser since I was spending a lot on disposable foam ones and now I can just refill. Many other available automatic dispensers don’t do foam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm-every time.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Best auto soap dispenser we’ve used. Hope the batteries last a long time. Easy to use. No drips. We bought two for the bathroom. Buying a third for kitchen sink.
customer_reviews.author: Messy Miracles

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Clean and efficient!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! I always hated using a soap pump in the kitchen when my hands were messy. This this automatic dispenser I don't have to wash the pump after washing my hands. Great kitchen device. I want another for the bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle H

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, but
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it five stars if the soap reservoir attached to the dispenser. I've had it up 5 minutes, and it's already been knocked off the base twice by my kids. Other than that, it's a great little product.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Yashenko

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for only 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: Less than 3 months and now it does not dispense anything. Major disappointment. It has been finicky when filling the container, I alway fit very loosely and would fall off if you didn’t hold the dispenser and the container together.
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. We did 1:4 ratio on soap to water which works great. Tried 1:3 but it wouldn’t dispense, possibly because it was too thick. Super easy for my kids to use. Would recommend this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable build quality, failed on day 4
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after three days. Changed batteries and soap to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Vonnegut

customer_reviews.title: Soap everywhere! Sensor doesn’t stop!
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love this, but it doesn’t work. It doesn’t snap or click together, so if you move the unit, it falls apart. If you go anywhere near it, the soap starts coming out and it doesn’t stop! Soap was everywhere. Do not purchase it!
customer_reviews.author: Tarra O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, but flawed
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great concept. But it’s a piece of crap. Works for a day and then stops working again. I’ve replaced the batteries multiple times and it works for a day and then stops again without warning
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Motion detection very bad
customer_reviews.text: I purchased another because I love this foam dispenser. This one takes too long to dispense. Defective? It takes about 3-5 seconds and a little waving around to work.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.T

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser worked great for a month then stopped. I changed the batteries but still didn't work. I contacted the seller and they immediately shipped out another unit. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie

customer_reviews.title: Conditions to work
customer_reviews.text: Used daily for about 5 months and continues to function, however, it no longer dispenses the same amount of soap.
customer_reviews.author: rebma

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until after the free return date new update
customer_reviews.text: No one near the soap dispenser and it turns on and releases soap Got a new dispenser within a couple of days and so far is working better than the last one. Will give it a 5 star soon if it still is working
customer_reviews.author: D Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Amount of Soap
customer_reviews.text: I really like this foaming soap dispenser. My biggest concern was if it would dispense adequate soap as that is not adjustable. It is truly the perfect amount. Everything stays clean. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Broke in three months
customer_reviews.text: This was great while it worked but that was only for three months. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: mobytojo

customer_reviews.title: It's wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's an effective & effcient way to have folks wash hands w/o using a ton of soap at a time. I will probably get another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Blissful Living

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, easy to use. Love the little smily face after you use it. Seriously love it!
customer_reviews.author: PeachyT

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Easy to use and very low change of random dispensing. Very glad I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: V. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Got it recently, so far so good. Dispenses nicely, easy to assemble, great that I can put my own antibacterial hand soap in it with out relying on proprietary soaps.
customer_reviews.author: amazonuser513

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: When it worked it worked pretty good but after a few months it has now be rendered useless.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Love the happy face
customer_reviews.text: It has a light up happy face that flashes for 20sec after soap is dispense to remember how long to wash your hands. My 86 yr old father loves it
customer_reviews.author: Kay S

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great for young kids! No more overuse of soap or soap all over the counter. You can pick between two soap settings for more or less.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great hands free dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought another brand and returned it because the soap had trouble coming out. Now I have 3 of these in my house and love them. I’ve had 2 of them for over a year now and still working great. If you put too much soap in the dispenser and it’s not working correctly, just add some more water. Great purchase for the 3rd time!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Gelb

product_meta.title: LAOPAO Soap Dispenser, Touchless Foaming Soap Dispenser Hand Free Countertop Soap Dispensers 240ml Xmas Gift Automatic Soap Pump for Bathroom Kitchen
feature_bullets: Automatic soap dispenser: Touchless foaming soap dispenser with high foam and low foam modes, it better meets your requirement.
Quick installation and safety refill: Remove the soap tank from the bottom to refill. You don't have to worry about the damage by liquid seeping into the dispenser through the button.
High precise sensor design with high-speed activation, it dispense foam instantly by a wave.
Easy operation by one button: Press it to turn on/off, long press for 3 seconds to choose high/low soap modes. Capacity: 240ml/8.12OZ capacity with visible volume, check volume at a glance.
We have 12-month warranty for all LAOPAO brand products. Click "Sold by Laopao Inc” under "Buy Now" button to get help from us.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars900 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
